description: This file defines an API service using Axios for HTTP requests, configured with a base URL. It includes a request interceptor to attach an authentication token from Supabase's session data to each request's headers. The file exports the configured API instance for use in other parts of the application.

methods.name: axios.create
methods.description: Creates a new Axios instance with specified configuration.

methods.name: api.interceptors.request.use
methods.description: Sets up a request interceptor to modify requests before they are sent, adding authentication headers.
